attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This country has gone 'politically correct' mad. I am scared to open my mouth for fear of being branded a racist. I heard the other day that the term 'black board' could not be used in schools the other day for fear of offending people. This is madness, perhaps the government should clarify what is and whats not racist comments, then we will know where we stand?

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
